Package gobblin.runtime.mapreduce

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CliMRJobLauncher
    A utility class for launching a Gobblin Hadoop MR job through the command line.
    GobblinOutputCommitter
    Hadoop OutputCommitter implementation that overrides the default GobblinOutputCommitter.abortJob(JobContext, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobStatus.State) behavior.
    GobblinOutputFormat
    Hadoop OutputFormat implementation with a custom OutputCommitter
    MRJobLauncher
    An implementation of JobLauncher that launches a Gobblin job as a Hadoop MR job.
    MRJobLauncher.TaskRunner
    The mapper class that runs assigned WorkUnits.
    MRTaskStateTracker
    A concrete extension to AbstractTaskStateTracker for Hadoop MapReduce based runtime.
